name: Smash the Peasants
description:
You play an evil knight, and because you are demoniac, you have to kill the all the poor peasants. But these peons fight back and intend to kill you for all your misdeeds. Get ready to battle against these angry laborers equipped with their simple fork.

Better play with GamePad !

Keyboard keys :

  • Attack -> Left Click
  • Dash -> Right Click
  • Poison -> Mouse 3
  • Move -> WASD

Credits : Victor LE and Etienne POV

Made for Ludum Dare 33
